snippet: The central bank repeated its plans to slowly lower its stimulus campaign as it gains confidence in the strength of the economic recovery.
abstract: Account of decision by Federal Reserve to change guidelines for its stimulus campaign reveals that decision does not change its commitment to supporting the economy; reinforces other efforts by Fed officials to play down significance of the March shift.
lead_paragraph: The central bank repeated its plans to slowly lower its stimulus campaign as it gains confidence in the strength of the economic recovery.

headline.main: Fed Recognized Change in Unemployment Goal Could Be Misunderstood
headline.print_headline: Fed Recognized Change in Unemployment Goal Could Be Misunderstood
